officialTitle: Impact of Electronic Treatment Plans on Shared Decision Making for Metastatic Breast Cancer: An Educational/Research Initiative
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Adherence (by providers) to evidence-based treatment recommendations for patients with metastatic breast cancer.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years of age or older
* diagnosis of metastatic breast cancer
* newly diagnosed or needing a new line of therapy and have not yet made a treatment decision
* able to understand English

Exclusion Criteria:

* any patient who cannot understand English
* any prisoner and/or other vulnerable person as defined by NIH (45 CFR 46, Subpart B, C, and D)
